Resistances.string: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren’t silvered
piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren’t silvered
slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren’t silvered

MonsterTrait.Name: Barbed Hide
MonsterTrait.Text: At the start of each of its turns, the barbed devil deals 5 (1d10) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

MonsterTrait.Name: Devil’s Sight
MonsterTrait.Text: Magical darkness doesn’t impede the devil’s darkvision.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The devil makes three melee attacks: one with its tail and two with its claws. Alternatively, it can use Hurl Flame twice.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Tail
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Hurl Flame
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 150 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn’t being worn or carried, it also catches fire.
